structure.unit: Assistance To The Aged And Disabled

law.catch_line: Monthly Advancements To Health Education And Welfare Department; Audit
law.text: [ Text of section effective until April 11, 2011. For text effective April 11, 2011, see below.] There shall be advanced from the state treasury to the Secretary of the United States Department of Health, Education and Welfare, prior to the first day of each month, an amount equal to said Secretary's estimate of state supplementary payments authorized under this chapter for such month. The department shall conduct, once in each fiscal year, an audit of such payments made by said Secretary on behalf of the commonwealth. Chapter 118A: Advancements to Social Security Administration [ Text of section as amended by 2011, 9, Sec. 10 effective April 11, 2011. For text effective until April 11, 2011, see above.] If the commissioner of transitional assistance elects federal administration of state supplementary payments, there shall be advanced from the state treasury to the Social Security Administration each month an amount equal to the estimated payments authorized for that month.
